author: David Kierznowski
content: I never realised Google hacking 1 was such a popular seller, although basic Google hacking techniques are a must for any security tester me thinks.

author: pagvac
content: I definitely look forward to the new version of the book. I'm sure it'll include some cool tricks.

author: Mark
content:
Has Google Hacking volume 2 been publsihed yet?  If not do you have a projected date?

Thanks.

author: pdp
content: Mark, we are currently wrapping up the book into a nice package. It should be out in a month time I guess.
